backend_error_description: Please try again. If this keeps happening please send me an email (to bugs@six-two.dev) with your inputs, so that I can track the bug down.
email_placeholder: Where should I send my response?
empty_email_description: You have not filled out the email field. You can leave it empty, but then how can I respond to you? If you REALLY cannot give me an email address, please include instruction of how to contact you in the message text.
empty_message_description: Hey, it looks as if you have left the message field empty.
invalid_email_description: Your email address does not look like an email address. Please check it for typos.
message_placeholder: Please write your message here. If you need to send me a file, upload it somewhere (Dropbox, Mega, Google drive etc) and just put the link here.
name: Name
oversize_message_description: Your message is too long. If you have big files, just upload them (to Dropbox, Mega.nz, Google drive, etc) and only put the link in the message.
